name: places/ChIJIQfVMOlYwokRboFT1zs33zY
formattedAddress: 151 E 65th St, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 151 E 65th St, New York, NY 10065-6607, USA

originalText.text:
This is a horrid place, as a Catholic education institute you would think that there would be compassion among the administrators. This is a place where all the administration cares about is the bottom line, and squeezing the girls and their families for every possible dollar. Sister Gail Morgan, the principal, is truly a disgrace to the church and has drifted away from the teachings of the bible, and is only interested in money. I am so disappointed and my family has cut ties with the school.
Not a place where a student can be sick or emotionally vulnerable, they will try to kick you out belittle you, in addition to charging you for schooling you never received.

originalText.text:
This is one of the worst institutions I've ever had the displeasure of knowing and attending. Do not send your daughter here. Unless you like being traumatized and wasting thousands of dollars.
I transferred here excited for the opportunity of a high quality education they claimed to have, and instead I had my high school career ruined and one of the worst school months I've ever had in my life. St. Vincent is horrid through and through - the faculty, their beliefs, and the students. They are a disgrace to the Church and to single gender schools.
